body_html: iirc, accreal type for float is float, so the computation is done in float. At any rate, the method used is extremely unstable, Welford method would give much better results https://docs.google.com/document/d/1V3VEm9zQ17jsbWT9dxK_iS5qRZZenU6tdApj-VsbGk0/edit
